title: Does ‘The Wizard of Oz’ Include a Munchkin Suicide?
subtitle: One of the most ubiquitous of film legends holds that a munchkin hanged himself on-camera during the filming of 'The Wizard of Oz.'
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A lovelorn actor portraying one of the munchkins hanged himself on the set during the filming of The Wizard of Oz.
